project_title.text: Revival of the Independent State Legislature Doctrine

project_preview_description.text: An analysis of the originalist doctrine gaining traction in election disputes â€” and why it's so dangerous

project_description.text: Written just prior to the 2020 election, this article is intended to shed light on a deeply concerning legal doctrine gaining traction among the conservative bloc of the Supreme Court. In it, I discuss the historical and textual grounding of the independent state legislature doctrine, as well as the profound implications it could have if applied to 2020 election disputes or future election cases.
